column1: Marine accident fatalities and injuries reported: 1999-2011
(a) United Kingdom registered merchant vessels of 100 gross tons and over, any location
Deaths of passengers, crew members and others by cause
Deaths and injuries to passengers by type of injury
Deaths and injuries to crew members by type of injury
Deaths and injuries to others (e.g. pilots, surveyors)
(b) Deaths of passengers, crew members and others, any vessels in UK waters1
Deaths of passengers, crew members and others by cause
1  Marine accidents recorded by the MAIB. The requirement on vessels to report accidents to the MAIB varies by vessel type and location (see Notes). However, the MAIB will record
details of, and may investigate, significant accidents of which they are notified by bodies such as the Coastguard.
2  A special exercise in 2005-2007 to research pleasure craft deaths resulted in higher recording of deaths.

column14: Source: Maritime Accidents Investigation Branch (MAIB), DfT
